entries.title: About Us
entries.aboutPageContent:
Since 2000, Australians have been using Cruiser’s fun flavours to lead the fight against boring.
Our iconic flavours bring a pop of colour to any event - from a chill backyard session to an arvo with mates on the beach or a quiet night in.

So remember, whoever you are, whatever you choose, there’s always an opportunity to add your own splash of colour to any occasion.

Stay Colourful with Vodka Cruiser’s world of flavour.
